players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I find it unfortunate that we've lost Charlie so early in the game. Let's all try to stay focused and work together to uncover the truth behind his sudden demise."

Diana: "I'm glad we're all committed to finding out what happened to Charlie. As a token of good faith, I suggest we share any suspicious occurrences or observations we may have had during the night."
